Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory150.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "So that Chaofeng's just gone? I thought he'd be coming with us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "We'll look suspicious if we're spotted hanging out with the Kowloong Crew. Besides, we already got what we wanted from him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm not sure what sort of helpers he got, so we'd better count on ourselves still. Just the two of us. Got it, Kamui?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Yup, just watch me wipe that system off the grid, ha!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "The system is called Huaxu, right? I looked it up in Babylonia's database, and it does share a similar design architecture to Gestalt.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'There are a lot of blanks though. I must apply for higher access from my superiors.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: '...So are you two going to attend the trade event later?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: '...Yeah. According to what Chaofeng said, Qu will only appear at the trade event.', 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "But the trade event should be held at that really open place we just passed by, right? Won't we be spotted instantly if we participate?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'We can probably hide ourselves in the buildings, but if we want to approach Qu as soon as we can, we have to be close to the central stage.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Looks like you'll have to actually attend the event, then. To ensure success, might I suggest... a little disguise?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "But we haven't brought any camouflage coating onto the ship.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'What if we use the merchandise inside the shipping crates, then? While tracking Chaofeng through your visuals, I found some compartments holding a lot of clothes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'That might work. If we dress up as a guest or a Construct on display, we could blend in quite easily.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Dressing up as merchandise on display should be your best choice. That way you'd be able to move around freely on the stage. Unfortunately the system only takes female Constructs...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray falls into deep thought for a bit. He studies the two Strike Hawk members carefully in turn, then, dawning on a solution, finally claps his hands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'Chrome, can you dress up as a femaleâ€”', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Lemme lemme lemme!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The two answer at almost the same time. Kamui, Chrome, and Murray end up staring at each other in a sudden awkward silence.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Kamui might be too tall and broad to find clothes that fit him. Compared to him, I should be the better choice.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'A very logical conclusion... As expected from the leader of the vanguard force...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Why did you offer up yourself, Kamui?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'll probably look real nice dressed up!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Male or female doesn't matter! I'm still me, and the leader is still the leader. It's all the same inside.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chrome nods quietly in approval.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'The Strike Hawk Squad sure is... quite enlightened...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Well, if one of you dress up as merchandise there has to be a seller, which might require talking...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'So Kamui, looks like you get to be pretty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'No problem! Still, even if I get a change of clothes, can I really survive till the last round?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "No need to worry about that. As long as we've got an outfit, I can direct the makeup process.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I guess I'll need your help for that, Chrome. More reason for Kamui to dress up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I have some dabbled a little in this... or I wouldn't have made the suggestion in the first place. You guys should try to acquire some clothes first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Meanwhile, I'll go brush up on how to do this with someone else... We can get in touch in 20 minutes, yeah?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Sure, twenty minutes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Well, then... Kamui, just follow me, don't wander off. Try not to catch the attention of the guards while we look for the clothes we need.", 4: '1'}
